QuestData.Title: Let's Get Out of Here!
QuestData.Description: The Light smiles upon me. I have not yet died in this living nightmare, but the Scourge will kill me and tear my body apart for use in their 'work' here if I cannot escape.$B$BI cannot make it on my own, $c, but with your help, I may yet live to fight the Scourge again.$B$BWill you help me make my escape before the Scourge's butchers come to finish me off?
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Father Kamaros to safety and then report to Brother Keltan aboard Orgrim's Hammer.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Brother Keltan at Orgrim's Hammer in Icecrown.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well. We thought Father Kamaros lost, for certain. Your bravery will serve as an example to all those who oppose the Scourge.
